DOC.brief_summary: This post-market clinical study AccuLIF expandable TLIF cage patient require surgery degenerative disc disease ( DDD ) Grade I spondylolisthesis retrolisthesis , one two level , L2 S1 .
DOC.detailed_description: Study evaluation evaluate pre-operatively 6-weeks , 3-months , 6-months , 12-months 24-months post-operatively ass clinical outcome , patient report outcome radiographic status .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject skeletally mature 18 70 year age . 2 . DDD Grade I spondylolisthesis retrolisthesis , require decompression arthrodesis one two contiguous level L2 S1 . 3 . No previous surgery adjacent level ( microdiscectomy / laminectomy ) adjacent level . 4 . Nonresponsive conservative ( nonsurgical ) treatment back pain minimum 6 month . 5 . Subject understands condition enrollment willing sign date Informed Consent . 6 . Subject agree comply visit schedule complete study questionnaire . 1 . Significant instability spine . 2 . Requires TLIF 2 level L2 S1 . 3 . Previously undergone lumbar spine surgery ( microdiscectomy / laminectomy ) adjacent level . 4 . Younger 18 year age , old 70 year age . 5 . BMI 40 great . 6 . History metabolic bone disease 7 . Osteoporosis 8 . Diabetes mellitus require daily insulin management . 9 . Subject following : 1 . Progressive neuromuscular disease ; OR 2 . Autoimmune disease ; OR 3 . Active malignancy within last 15 year ; OR 4 . Active hepatitis ; OR 5 . AIDS , ARC , HIV positive ; OR 6 . Syringomyelia spinal level ; OR 7 . Any condition would interfere subject self assessment pain , function quality life . 10 . Allergy implant material ( titanium , titanium alloy ) . 11 . Active systemic infection infection localize site implantation . 12 . Primary metastatic tumor involve spine . 13 . Open wound inadequate issue tissue coverage operative site . 14 . History significant mental illness mental incapacity . 15 . Pregnancy intent become pregnant . 16 . Participating another investigational study similar purpose . 17 . Belongs vulnerable population would compromise ability provide informed consent compliance followup requirement . 18 . Smokers unwilling cease 3 month postop recent history alcohol substance abuse within past 2 year . 19 . Workers compensation .
